headline: KKR Appoints Former Eaton CEO Craig Arnold to Board of Directors, Increasing Independent Seats to Eleven
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) is one of the most undervalued stocks to buy and hold for 5 years. On September 24, KKR & Co. announced that Craig Arnold has been appointed to its Board of Directors, with the appointment becoming effective on September 23. The appointment of Arnold, who is the former Chairman and […]

headline: Eaton Corporation: Buy Rating Backed By Structural Demand And FCF Strength
summary: Eaton (ETN) is a top buy for 2024-2027 with strong growth in data centers, electrification, and aerospace. Read here for an investment analysis.
